content: Analyze the current decompression flow and identify where Content-Encoding headers should be removed
Revert header removal changes and use PayloadBytes instead
Update markdown buffer to use PayloadBytes for human-readable content
Update decode logic to convert JSON back to binary when reading markdown
Test with the actual snapshot to ensure content is readable
Fix writeHTTPBody to handle binary protobuf data when PayloadBytes falls back to raw bytes
Clean up implementation to minimal change set - remove base64 protobuf handling and other unnecessary code
Test roundtrip compatibility - ensure decoding still works correctly
